channel.title: Java class file compiler
channel.description: Ok so i just decompiled this .jar file now i used a class editor to chang what i want now how can i recompile the class files all together ot form that .jar file and run it????

[/quote]

It’s often a good idea to glance over what retards say instead of looking in depth, because that’s how they organise their posts.[/quote]i think it is more to do with the fact that you were in his position not long ago
